source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) AS recordCount from SalesLt.Product

activities.name: read csv file for product and customer data
iterate Item of product and customer

dependsOn.activity: read csv file for product and customer data

items.value: @activity('read csv file for product and customer data').output.value

activities.name: Copy data of customer and product
Copy data for customer and customer address

source.sqlReaderQuery: select Max(LastModifiedDate) as lastRunDate from SalesLt.HighWaterMark_Table
select Max(ModifiedDate) as lastRunDate from SalesLt.Product

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from SalesLT.Product where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('Get HighWater Mark Table Value').output.firstRow.lastRunDate}' and ModifiedDate<='@{activity('PRODUCT DATA LAST MODIFIED DATE').output.firstRow.lastRunDate}'
select '@{activity('PRODUCT DATA LAST MODIFIED DATE').output.firstRow.lastRunDate}' as LastModifiedDate
